mapper.select: SELECT aa.maDichVu AS maDichVu, aa.maChiSo AS maChiSo, aa.tenChiSo AS tenChiSo, aa.giaTri AS giaTri, aa.ketLuan AS ketLuan, aa.ngayKq AS ngayKq FROM iceberg.admision_checkin ac INNER JOIN iceberg.admision_subclinical aa ON aa.admision_checkin_uuid = ac.id WHERE ac.maCskb = #{maCskcb} AND ac.id = #{idCheckIn}
